r.s: A compact, more readable alternative to var_export.
r.d: var_representation is a compact alternative to var_export that properly escapes control characters
r.n: * Switch from infinite recursion detection on the object's properties to infinite recursion detection on the object itself. This conforms with the change to var_export/debug_zval_dump in php 8.2-dev, and would allow data structures to safely start returning temporary arrays that can be garbage collected to save memory (after dumping the representation) starting in php 8.2+.
